00032 class tab{
00033 public:
00034   int n;
00035   char f;
00036   tab(int nspaces, char fill=' ') : n(nspaces),f(fill) {}
00037 };
00038 
00039 ostream& operator<<(ostream& out, tab t)
00040 { return out<<left<<setfill(t.f)<<setw(t.n); }

00042 void PrintResults(std::map<int, FitTH1F*>* spectra)
00043 {
00044         
00045   cout<<"\n"<<tab(55,'*')<<""<<endl;
00046   cout<<"Current results are: "<<endl;
00047   cout<<tab(10)<<"Channel"<<tab(11)<<"spe_mean"<<tab(12)<<"spe_sigma";
00048   cout<<tab(11)<<"lambda"<<tab(11)<<"amp_E"<<tab(12)<<"p_E"<<tab(12)<<"Chi2/NDF";
00049   cout<<tab(6)<<"|||"<<tab(10)<<"pdfmean"<<tab(11)<<"pdfsigma"<<"pdfmean_err";
00050   cout<<endl;
00051   cout<<tab(104,'-')<<""<<endl;
00052   map<int, FitTH1F*>::iterator it = spectra->begin();
00053   for( ; it != spectra->end(); it++){
00054     cout<<tab(10)<<it->first;
00055     TF1* fit = (it->second)->GetFunction("spefunc");
00056     if(!fit){
00057       cout<<endl;
00058       continue;
00059     }
00060         
00061         
00062         double* params=fit->GetParameters();
00063         //double sigma_1=sqrt(params[FitOverROI::SHOTNOISE]*params[SHOTNOISE] + params[SIGMA]*params[SIGMA]);
00064         //double pdfmean=(1-params[FitOverROI::P_E])*(params[MEAN]+ sigma_1/(sqrt(2 * TMath::Pi()) * 0.5 *(1- TMath::Erf(-params[MEAN]/(sigma_1*sqrt(2))))) *TMath::Power(TMath::E(),-0.5 *params[MEAN]*params[MEAN]/(sigma_1 * sigma_1))) + params[P_E] * params[AMP_E];
00065     cout<<tab(11)<<params[MEAN]<<tab(12)<<params[SIGMA];
00066     cout<<tab(11)<<params[LAMBDA];
00067         cout<<tab(11)<<params[AMP_E];
00068         cout<<tab(12)<<params[P_E];
00069     stringstream s;
00070     s<<fit->GetChisquare()<<"/"<<fit->GetNDF();
00071     cout<<tab(12)<<s.str();
00072     cout<<tab(6)<<"|||";
00073         cout<<tab(10)<<m_n(params);
00074     //afan------------
00075     //double pdfmean_approx = params[P_E]*params[AMP_E]+(1-params[P_E])*params[MEAN];
00076     cout<<tab(11)<<sigma_n(params);
00077     double pdfmean_error = FitOverROI::pdfmean_error_corr((it->second)->fitResult);
00078     cout <<tab(10)<<pdfmean_error;
00079     
00080     //----------------
00081         
00082         
00083         //cout<<tab(10);
00084     if(fit->GetProb() < 0.01)
00085       cout<<"!";
00086     if(fit->GetProb() < 0.001)
00087       cout<<"!";
00088     cout<<endl;
00089   }
00090   cout<<tab(55,'*')<<""<<endl;
00091 }

00093 void DrawSpectra(map<int, FitTH1F*>* spectra, TCanvas* c)
00094 {
00095   c->Clear();
00096   DividePad(c,spectra->size());
00097   int padn=1;
00098   for( std::map<int,FitTH1F*>::iterator it = spectra->begin();
00099        it != spectra->end(); it++){
00100     //RootGraphix::Lock lock = root.AcquireLock();
00101     c->cd(padn++);
00102     gPad->SetLogy();
00103     TH1* hist = (it->second);
00104     hist->Draw();
00105   }
00106   c->cd(0);    
00107   c->Draw();
00108   c->Update();
00109 }

00111 void UpdateDatabase(map<int,FitTH1F*>* spectra, TTree* Events, ChanFitSettings ChannelSettings[])
00112 {
00113   const string table="laserruns";
00114   //find the runid
00115   EventData* ev = 0;
00116   Events->SetBranchAddress("event",&ev);
00117   Events->GetEntry(0);
00118   
00119 
00120   
00121   if(ev->run_id < 0){
00122     std::cerr<<"Unable to read runid from rootfile! Aborting."<<std::endl;
00123     return;
00124   }
00125   
00126   cout<<"How many filters were used in this run? "<<endl;
00127   int nfilters;
00128   cin>>nfilters;
00129   std::vector<RunDB::laserinfo> vec;
00130 for( map<int,FitTH1F*>::iterator it = spectra->begin();
00131 it != spectra->end(); it++){
00132         Events->GetEntry(0);
00133         for(int i =1;(ev->GetChannelByID(it->first)->regions.size() < 1) && (i<Events->GetEntries());i++)
00134         {  
00135                 Events->GetEntry(i);
00136         }
00137         if(ev->GetChannelByID(it->first)->regions.size() < 1){
00138                 std::cout<<"no regions found anywhere in tree!"<<endl;
00139                 throw std::runtime_error("No regions found in tree");
00140         }
00141         
00142         TF1* spefunc = (it->second)->GetFunction("spefunc");
00143         if(!spefunc){
00144                 cerr<<"Unable to get spefunc from channel "<<it->first<<endl;
00145                 continue;
00146         }
00147         std::stringstream CFSss;
00148         ChannelSettings[it->first].WriteTo(CFSss);
00149         std::string CFSstring = CFSss.str();
00150         FitTH1F* hist = it->second;
00151         
00152         int Runid = ev->run_id;
00153         int Channel = it->first;
00154         time_t Runtime=ev->timestamp;
00155         
00156         double Roi_start = ev->GetChannelByID(it->first)->regions[0].start_time;
00157                 //          double Roi_start, double Roi_end, FitTH1F* h, std::string Fitsettings
00158         
00159     vec.push_back(RunDB::laserinfo(Runid, 
00160                                    Channel,  
00161                                    Runtime,
00162                                    nfilters,
00163                                    Roi_start,
00164                                    ev->GetChannelByID(it->first)
00165                                      ->regions[0].end_time,
00166                                    hist, CFSstring) )
00167                                    ; 
00168     
00169   }
00170   int rows = InsertLaserInfo(vec);
00171   std::cout<<rows<<" entries were successfully inserted into the database."
00172            <<std::endl;
00173 }

00175 void RefitChannel(FitTH1F* h, int entries, TCanvas* c, ChanFitSettings& CFS)
00176 {
00177   c->Clear();
00178   h->Draw();
00179   string response="";
00180 
00181 /*   TNamed* options = (TNamed*)h->FindObject("options");
00182   if(!options){
00183     options = new TNamed("options","");
00184     options->SetBit(TObject::kCanDelete, true);
00185     h->GetListOfFunctions()->Add(options); 
00186   }*/
00187   while( response[0] != 'r' && response[0] != 'f'
00188          && response[0] != 's' &&response[0] != 'd'){
00189     if(response != "")
00190       cerr<<response<<" is not a valid option!"<<endl;
00191     cout<<"Would you like to \n"
00192         <<" r) Rebin the histogram\n"
00193         <<" s) Suppress the background exponential in the fit\n"
00194         <<" f) fix the fit by altering the config\n"
00195         <<" d) refit with the default method\n"
00196         <<endl;
00197     cin >> response;
00198   }
00199 /*   std::string optstring = options->GetTitle();
00200   optstring += response;
00201   options->SetTitle(optstring.c_str()); */
00202   
00203 
00204   bool allow_bg = true;
00205   bool force_old = false;
00206   if(response.find('d') != string::npos){}
00207   if(response.find('r') != string::npos){
00208     int lastbin = h->GetXaxis()->GetLast();
00209     h->Rebin();
00210     h->GetXaxis()->SetRange(0,lastbin/2);
00211   }
00212  
00213   if(response.find('s') != string::npos){
00214     allow_bg = false;
00215   }
00216   if(response.find('f') != string::npos){
00217 
00218         char temppath[]="/tmp/fileXXXXXX";
00219         int test = mkstemp(temppath);
00220         if(test == -1){
00221           Message(ERROR)<<"Unable to open temp file!\n";
00222           return;
00223         }
00224         fstream tempfile(temppath, fstream::in | fstream::out | fstream::app);
00225         CFS.WriteTo(tempfile);
00226         tempfile<<endl<<"# Parameter meanings:"<<endl;
00227         tempfile<<"# amp_E: Decay constant of SPE exponential"<<endl;
00228         tempfile<<"# constant: Normalization to number of events"<<endl;
00229         tempfile<<"# lambda: Occupancy"<<endl;
00230         tempfile<<"# mean: SPE gaussian center"<<endl;
00231         tempfile<<"# p_E: Proportion of total SPE distribution in the exponential"<<endl;
00232         tempfile<<"# pedmean: Pedestal gaussian center"<<endl;
00233         tempfile<<"# pedrange: Range looked at to find pedestal center."<<endl;
00234         tempfile<<"# range: Histogram x-axis range"<<endl;
00235         tempfile<<"# shotnoise: Pedestal width"<<endl;
00236         tempfile<<"# sigma: SPE gaussian width"<<endl;
00237         tempfile.clear();
00238         tempfile.close();
00239         std::stringstream command;
00240     command << "emacs "<<temppath;
00241     if( system(command.str().c_str()) ){
00242       std::cerr<<"Unable to open config for editing."<<std::endl;
00243     }
00244         else{
00245                 
00246                 tempfile.open(temppath, fstream::in);
00247                 CFS.ReadFrom(tempfile);
00248                 cout<<"Config File read back."<<endl;
00249                 CFS.WriteTo(cout);
00250                 cout<<endl;
00251         }
00252         tempfile.close();
00253         remove(temppath);
00254   }
00255   FitSPE(h, CFS,entries,allow_bg, force_old);
00256   //FitSPE(h,entries,min,max,allow_bg);
00257 }

00260 void QueryUser(map<int, FitTH1F*>* spectra, TTree* Events, RootGraphix* root, ChanFitSettings ChannelSettings[], 
00261                TCanvas* c = 0)
00262 {
00263   if(!c)
00264     c = new TCanvas;
00265   bool showresults=true;
00266   string response = "";
00267   while(response != "q"){
00268     if(showresults){
00269       RootGraphix::Lock lock = root->AcquireLock();
00270       DrawSpectra(spectra, c);
00271       PrintResults(spectra);
00272     }
00273     showresults=false;
00274     cout<<"Enter \n q) to quit, \n"
00275         <<" #) to retry fitting channel # \n"
00276         <<" r#) to remove channel # from the list\n"
00277         <<" w) to write the results to the database."<<endl;
00278     cin >> response;
00279     if(response == "q"){
00280       cout<<"Aborting without saving results."<<endl;
00281       break;
00282     }
00283     if(response == "w"){
00284       UpdateDatabase(spectra, Events, ChannelSettings);
00285       break;
00286     }
00287     bool remove = false;
00288     if( response[0] == 'r'){
00289       remove = true;
00290       response.erase(0,1);
00291     }
00292     int chan = atoi(response.c_str());
00293     if( chan == 0 && response != "0"){
00294       //user entered something weird
00295       cout<<"'"<<response<<"' is not a valid response!"<<endl;
00296       continue;
00297     }
00298     //ok, we should have a number in there
00299     //find the relevant channel
00300     map<int, FitTH1F*>::iterator it = spectra->find(chan);
00301     if( it == spectra->end()){
00302       cout<<chan<<" is not a valid channel!"<<endl;
00303       continue;
00304     }
00305     showresults = true;
00306     if(remove){
00307       (it->second)->Delete();
00308       spectra->erase(it);
00309       continue;
00310     }
00311     else{
00312       RootGraphix::Lock lock = root->AcquireLock();
00313       FitTH1F* h = (it->second);
00314       RefitChannel(h,Events->GetEntries(),c,ChannelSettings[it->first]);
00315       showresults=true;
00316       c->Update();
00317       continue;
00318     }
00319   } 
00320   if(c) delete c;
00321 }

00323 int ProcessLaserRun(const char* fname, unsigned region=0,bool rehist=false,bool min=false)
00324 {
00325         ParameterList* ChanSettingsHandler = new ParameterList("ChannelsSettings","Stores 8 channels of fit settings");
00326         ChanFitSettings ChannelsSettings[ mNCHANS ];
00327         
00328         
00329         for(int j=0; j< mNCHANS; j++){
00330                 stringstream name;
00331                 stringstream help;
00332                 name<<"chan"<<j;
00333                 help<<"Fit settings for channel "<<j;
00334                 ChanSettingsHandler->RegisterParameter(name.str(),ChannelsSettings[j], help.str());
00335                 }
00336         ifstream CFSConfig("cfg/LaserCFSConfig.cfg");
00337         ChanSettingsHandler->ReadFrom(CFSConfig);
00338         CFSConfig.close();
00339         
00340   const int nbins=315;
00341   const double start=-30, end=600; 
00342   std::map<int,FitTH1F*> spectra;
00343   std::map<int,FitTH1F*> spectra2; //historgram of amplitude (min)
00344   RootGraphix root;
00345   root.Initialize();
00346   TFile *f= OpenFile(fname,"UPDATE");
00347   if(!f){cout<<"File not opened!"<<endl;}
00348   TTree* Events = GetEventsTree(fname);
00349   if(!Events) {cout<< "!Events"<<endl; return -1;}
00350 
00351         
00352   EventData* event=0;
00353   Events->SetBranchAddress("event",&event);
00354   Events->GetEntry(0);
00355   cout<<"There are "<<Events->GetEntries()<<" entries in this tree."<<endl;
00356 
00357    //check for cached histograms
00358         bool found_all=true;
00359 
00360         //if(event->channels.size() > 10){cout<< "channels.size() >10"<<endl;    return -2;}
00361         if(!rehist){
00362                 for(size_t j=0; j < event->channels.size(); j++){
00363                         TString name = "channel";
00364                         ChannelData* channel = &(event->channels.at(j));
00365                         name += channel->channel_id;
00366                         FitTH1F *histo= new FitTH1F();
00367                         int read= histo->Read(name);
00368                         cout<<"readvar" << read<<endl;
00369                         if (read==0) { found_all = false; delete histo; break; }
00370 
00371                         if(found_all){
00372                                 cout<<"Loaded cached histogram "<<name<<endl;
00373                                 std::map<int,FitTH1F*>::iterator mapit = spectra.find(channel->channel_id);
00374 
00375                                 if(mapit == spectra.end()){
00376                                         spectra.insert( std::make_pair(channel->channel_id, histo) );     }
00377                                   else{
00378                                         histo = (mapit->second);
00379                                   }
00380                                 }
00381                 }
00382         }
00383   //Create histograms of amplitude (min) (by Xiaoyang)
00384         if(min){
00385      for(int i=0; i < Events->GetEntries(); i++){
00386                 if(i%5000 == 0) cout<<"Processing Entry "<<i<<endl;
00387                 
00388                         Events->GetEntry(i);
00389                         //iterate over all channels
00390                         
00391                         
00392                         for(size_t j=0; j < event->channels.size(); j++){
00393                           ChannelData* channel = &(event->channels.at(j));
00394                           if(channel->channel_id < 0){
00395                                 cout<<"channel->channel_id < 0"<<endl;
00396                                 continue;
00397                                 }
00398                           std::map<int,FitTH1F*>::iterator mapit = spectra2.find(channel->channel_id);
00399                           FitTH1F* histo=0;
00400                           if(mapit == spectra2.end()){
00401                                 TString name = "channel";
00402                                 name += channel->channel_id;
00403                                 cout<<"Creating new histogram with name "<<name<<endl;
00404                                 histo = new FitTH1F(name,name,nbins,start,end);
00405                                 spectra2.insert( std::make_pair(channel->channel_id, histo) );
00406                           }
00407                           else{
00408                                 histo = (mapit->second);
00409                           }
00410                 
00411                           //fill the histogram
00412                           if(!histo){
00413                         cerr<<"Null pointer passed!\n";
00414                         return -2;
00415                           }
00416 
00417                         if( channel->regions.size() > region){  
00418                                 histo->Fill( -channel->regions.at(region).min);
00419                         }
00420                 }
00421         }
00422 
00423         
00424   //Draw all the histograms
00425   TCanvas* cmin = new TCanvas("cmin",fname);
00426   cmin->SetLogy();
00427   for( std::map<int,FitTH1F*>::iterator it = spectra2.begin();
00428        it != spectra2.end(); it++){
00429     RootGraphix::Lock lock = root.AcquireLock();
00430     FitTH1F* hist = (it->second);
00431     hist->Draw();
00432         if(rehist||!found_all){ hist->Write(hist->GetName(),TObject::kOverwrite);}
00433         cout<<"about to fit"<<endl;
00434         //FitSPE(hist, ChannelsSettings[it->first], Events->GetEntries());
00435         cout<<"done fitting"<<endl;
00436          cmin->Update();
00437   }
00438  DrawSpectra(&spectra2,cmin);
00439         }
00440 
00441         //create historgams of integrals
00442   if(!found_all||rehist){
00443           //process the tree line by line, and create histograms for each channel
00444           for(int i=0; i < Events->GetEntries(); i++){
00445                 if(i%5000 == 0) cout<<"Processing Entry "<<i<<endl;
00446                 
00447                         Events->GetEntry(i);
00448                         //iterate over all channels
00449                         /*
00450                           if(event->channels.size() > 10){    
00451                                 cout<<"channels.size()>10"<<endl;
00452                                 return -2;}
00453                         */
00454                         for(size_t j=0; j < event->channels.size(); j++){
00455                           ChannelData* channel = &(event->channels.at(j));
00456                           if(channel->channel_id < 0){
00457                                 cout<<"channel->channel_id < 0"<<endl;
00458                                 continue;
00459                                 }
00460         if(!channel->baseline.found_baseline){
00461                                 if (i==0){cout<<"channel "<<channel->channel_id<<": no baseline found, skipping"<<endl;}
00462                                 continue;
00463                                 }
00464                           std::map<int,FitTH1F*>::iterator mapit = spectra.find(channel->channel_id);
00465                           FitTH1F* histo=0;
00466                           if(mapit == spectra.end()){
00467                                 TString name = "channel";
00468                                 name += channel->channel_id;
00469                                 cout<<"Creating new histogram with name "<<name<<endl;
00470                                 histo = new FitTH1F(name,name,nbins,start,end);
00471                                 spectra.insert( std::make_pair(channel->channel_id, histo) );
00472                           }
00473                           else{
00474                                 histo = (mapit->second);
00475                           }
00476                 
00477                           //fill the histogram
00478                           if(!histo){
00479                         cerr<<"Null pointer passed!\n";
00480                         return -2;
00481                           }
00482                         //if(channel->pulses.size() > region)   histo->Fill( -channel->pulses.at(region).integral);
00483                         if( channel->regions.size() > region){  
00484                             histo->Fill( -channel->regions.at(region).integral);
00485                         }
00486                 }
00487         }
00488   }
00489         
00490   //Draw all the histograms
00491   TCanvas* c = new TCanvas("c",fname);
00492   c->SetLogy();
00493   for( std::map<int,FitTH1F*>::iterator it = spectra.begin();
00494        it != spectra.end(); it++){
00495     RootGraphix::Lock lock = root.AcquireLock();
00496     FitTH1F* hist = (it->second);
00497     hist->Draw();
00498         if(rehist||!found_all){ hist->Write(hist->GetName(),TObject::kOverwrite);}
00499         cout<<endl<<"About to fit channel: "<<it->first<<endl<<endl;
00500         FitSPE(hist, ChannelsSettings[it->first], Events->GetEntries());
00501         cout<<endl<<"Done fitting channel: "<<it->first<<endl<<endl;
00502     c->Update();
00503   } 
00504   
00505   
00506   QueryUser(&spectra, Events, &root, ChannelsSettings, c);
00507   f->Close();
00508   return spectra.size();
00509   
00510 }
00511 
00512 int main(int argc, char** argv)
00513 {
00514   bool rehist=false; 
00515   bool reprocess=false;
00516   bool min = false; //amplitude switch
00517   bool mc=false;
00518 
00519   ConfigHandler* config = ConfigHandler::GetInstance();
00520   config->AddCommandSwitch('m',"amplitude","generate histogram of amplitude",
00521                            CommandSwitch::Toggle(min));
00522   config->AddCommandSwitch('r',"rehist","re-histogram data",
00523                            CommandSwitch::Toggle(rehist));
00524   config->AddCommandSwitch('p',"reprocess",
00525                            "Force (re)processing of genroot output",
00526                            CommandSwitch::SetValue<bool>(reprocess,true)); 
00527   config->AddCommandSwitch('s',"mc",
00528                            "Data is MC simulation",
00529                            CommandSwitch::SetValue<bool>(mc,true));
00530 
00531   config->SetProgramUsageString("laserrun [options] <run number>");
00532   config->ProcessCommandLine(argc,argv);
00533   
00534   if(argc != 2){
00535     config->PrintSwitches(true);
00536   }
00537   //generate the run filename
00538   int run = atoi(argv[1]);
00539   std::stringstream rootfile, rawfile;
00540   if(!mc){
00541     rootfile << "/data/singlepe/Run";
00542     rawfile  << "/data/rawdata/Run";
00543     rootfile<<std::setw(6)<<std::setfill('0')<<run<<".root";
00544     rawfile<<std::setw(6)<<std::setfill('0')<<run<<"/Run"<<std::setw(6)<<std::setfill('0')<<run<<".out";
00545   } else {
00546     rootfile << "/data/test_processing/mc_singlepe/Run";
00547     rawfile  << "/data/test_processing/mc_singlepe_raw/Run";
00548     rootfile<<std::setw(6)<<std::setfill('0')<<run<<".root";
00549     rawfile<<std::setw(6)<<std::setfill('0')<<run<<"/Run"<<std::setw(6)<<std::setfill('0')<<run<<".out";
00550   }
00551 
00552   std::ifstream fin(rootfile.str().c_str());
00553   if(reprocess || !fin.is_open()){
00554     if(!reprocess){
00555       std::cout<<"The processed rootifle "<<rootfile.str()<<" is not present."
00556                <<"\nWould you like to create it now? (y/n)"<<std::endl;
00557       char answer;
00558       std::cin>>answer;
00559       if(answer != 'y' && answer != 'Y'){
00560         std::cout<<"OK, aborting"<<endl;
00561         return 1;
00562       }
00563     }
00564     std::stringstream command;
00565     if(!mc){
00566       command << "./genroot --cfg cfg/laserrun_analysis.cfg "<<rawfile.str();
00567     } else {
00568       command << "./genroot --cfg cfg/laserrun_mc_analysis.cfg "<<rawfile.str();
00569     }
00570 
00571     if( system(command.str().c_str()) ){
00572       std::cerr<<"Unable to generate rootfile; aborting."<<std::endl;
00573       return 1;
00574     }
00575   }
00576   fin.close();
00577   return ProcessLaserRun(rootfile.str().c_str(),0,rehist,min);
00578 }
